item.title: Create 1 UGC TikTok/Reel for my educational content - Upwork
item.description:
I am hiring someone to create 1 UGC TikTok/Reel for my educational content. You need to be enthusiastic, articulate, and have good lighting and sound quality. I will provide the script and do the editing.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 28, 2024 10:41 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:US English Dialect, English, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, UGC, Content Distribution & Promotion, Video Ad, Video Ad Campaign
Skills: US English Dialect, English, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, UGC, Content Distribution & Promotion, Video Ad, Video Ad Campaign
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: GBR
click to apply
